Articles.Content:
I'm aware of the two existent mods to sort out crafts. I tested both of them and, although I think they all work great, I wish there was something simpler out there. Hence my idea, the Contraption-sorter-o-matic, a simple plugin to the stock craft file menu. Bear with me:

This would have no app button, no window, would be simply a matter of putting descriptions as hashtags into the craft description field for the mod to recognize it as categories. Then, on the side-menu, the player would be able to pick the tags, toggling them on or off to show the crafts described with them. Just that. Feasible? I hope so. I wish I could code that myself, but since I'm an ignorant on matters of coding, I leave my idea here for anyone willing to take it.

Edit: yes, "buttom" is misspelled. Sorry about that.
